Factorial Tools


Drupal Module that provides various commonly used helper functions
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Drupal Module that provides various commonly used helper functions
docs.title: Factorial Tools
Entity delete

docs.text: Note  These function are compatible with  hook_update_N() .
docs.title: Entity Delete

docs.text: To delete all entities of particular type use  factorial_tools_entities_delete()
docs.title: factorial_tools_entities_delete()
Examples

docs.text: Optionally we have a helper function to delete entities by providing a  Drupal::entityQuery .
docs.title: factorial_tools_entities_delete_by_query()
Examples
